title: Congressman Jamie Raskin on Impeachment
itunes:title: Congressman Jamie Raskin on Impeachment
description:
Kevin spoke with Bryan Lanza, Managing Director, Mercury. Former Trump for President Deputy Comms Director and Trump Transition Team Comms Director, and Adrienne Elrod, Democratic Strategist, and Clinton 2016 Presidential Campaign Director of Strategic Communications. They discussed trade, Huawei, Iran and Mueller.

Kevin also spoke with Congressman Jamie Raskin about impeachment.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
